# Multipurpose Alpine Military Mobility Training Facility
## Request for Supply Arrangement

**Notice Reference:** WS4387528098-Doc4387534846

**Notice Type:** Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA)

**Procurement Category:** Services (SRV)

**Notice Description:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) invites contractors to provide services for a Multipurpose Alpine Military Mobility Training Facility in Canada. The training facility will be used for various mobility training exercises, including the use of different types of transportation equipment, in a mountainous and austere environment. The training exercises will be conducted for up to 14 soldiers and will include firing activities in a controlled environment.

**Key Requirements:**

* Provide facilities, instructors, and equipment for mobility training exercises
* Deliver training exercises for up to 14 soldiers in a mountainous and austere environment
* Conduct training exercises in a controlled environment, including firing activities
* Two separate streams for Indigenous and non-Indigenous business offerors

**Contracting Entity:**

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

**Procurement Method:**

* Competitive - Open bidding

**Selection Criteria:** Not applicable

**Trade Agreements:** No trade agreements are applicable for this RFSA

**Regions of Opportunity:**

* Canada
* United States of America

**Notice URL:**

* [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18478332?extsite=MTg0NzgzMzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18478332?extsite=MTg0NzgzMzJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Important Dates:**

* Notice Date: 2024-01-10
* Tender Closing Date: 2027-01-14, 14:00 EST

Please note: All submitted bids must meet the requirements specified in the RFSA, and any late submissions will be deemed non-conformity. [1] (1)
